# easyPlot

## Overview

`easyPlot` is a graphical user interface for ggplot2 which allows the user to create different kind of plots (scatterplots, histograms, boxplots and bar charts) and dynamically generates a reproducible code.


## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("majkamichal/easyPlot")
```

## Usage

```{r eval=FALSE }
easyPlot::easyPlot()

easyPlot::easyPlot(iris)
```
